com.mousebird.maply

Class QuadTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.QuadTracker

  • public class QuadTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    The quad tracker keeps track of quad tree nodes.

    This object tracks quad tree nodes as they're added to and removed from an internal quad tree that tracks them by screen importance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuadTracker(GlobeController globeController, CoordSystem coordSystem, Point2d ll, Point2d ur, int minLevel)
      Set up the quad tracker with a valid globe controller.

    • Method Detail

      • finalise

        public void finalise()

      • queryTiles

        public void queryTiles(QuadTrackerPointReturn ptReturn)
        Run the queries against the samples in the QuadTrackerPointReturn. Each sample should have a screen location set. The rest will be filled in by the query.

      • addTile

        public void addTile(MaplyTileID tileID)

        Remove the given tile from tracking.

      • getMinLevel

        public int getMinLevel()
        Return the minimum level. The maximum isn't set.
